section.title: The file gpt2_5.grd
section.para: In order to use the software package (gpt2.cpp), you will need an (ascii) file called gpt2_5.grd, which provides a grid and is read by some function. This file is distributed by the IERS and can be found at its website ().

question.para: Where is the path to gpt2_5.grd set ?
Can you change the gpt2_5.grd installation directory ?

answer.para:
Yes. You can set accordingly the @datarootdir@ during make and make install. Or you can do it manually: download the grid file to your preferred location, for example /foo/bar/gpt2_5.grd. Then set the path accordingly at the file src/gpt2.cpp:
/** @brief Define the path to the gpt2_5.grd file (including the filename) */ #define PATH_TO_GRD25_GRD "/foo/bar/gpt2_5.grd" .
